comments.body: This package compiles code, so you should add the `toolchain` build requirement.

Note that we [have a `brotli` package](https://github.com/conda-forge/brotli-feedstock), so it'd be nice to have `brotlipy` just depend on that for the library and only be the python wrapper. But unfortunately, although support for that was added in June (https://github.com/python-hyper/brotlipy/pull/94) it hasn't been released in brotlipy yet. So we can look into that when the next `brotlipy` release comes out.
